snippet.title: Badiya E3 2016 Stage Interview at the PC Gaming Show
snippet.description:
Badiya Alpha 1 is available now on Steam Early Access on this link:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/545050/

Check out this stage interview of Ahmad Jadallah the Director of Development at Semaphore to discuss our upcoming game Badiya.
